name: The Bouncing One
description:
Game submission for the #GMTK Game Jam 2019, with the theme "Only one". Check this link for more info: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2019

This game only has one action, to place barriers on the edges of the screen (by clicking them)  to save THE BOUNCING ONE.

Only one action.

Only one screen.

Only one life.

Only one level.

But most importantly... only one... BOUNCING ONE.

The game was made in collaboration with Ana Agudo.
